pois.name: Netarhat
pois.description: Known as the 'Queen of Chotanagpur', Netarhat is a beautiful hill station offering panoramic views and pleasant weather.
pois.description_hindi: चोटानागपुर की रानी के रूप में जाना जाने वाला नेतरहाट एक सुंदर हिल स्टेशन है जो मनोरम दृश्य और सुखद मौसम प्रदान करता है।
pois.transport_access: Road accessible, nearest railway station: Ranchi
pois.special_notes: Best for nature lovers and photography enthusiasts. Carry warm clothes during winter months.
pois.cultural_significance: Popular among locals for weekend getaways and honeymoon trips.
pois.safety_notes: Safe for families. Road conditions can be challenging during monsoon.

pois.name: Betla National Park
pois.description: Jharkhand's only national park, home to tigers, elephants, and diverse wildlife in a pristine forest setting.
pois.description_hindi: झारखंड का एकमात्र राष्ट्रीय उद्यान, जहाँ बाघ, हाथी और विविध वन्यजीव एक प्राचीन वन सेटिंग में रहते हैं।
pois.special_notes: Best time for wildlife spotting is early morning and evening. Advance booking recommended.
pois.cultural_significance: Important conservation area preserving Jharkhand's wildlife heritage.
pois.safety_notes: Follow park rules strictly. Do not venture alone in forest areas.

pois.name: Hundru Falls
pois.description: One of Jharkhand's most spectacular waterfalls, cascading down 98 meters into a deep gorge.
pois.description_hindi: झारखंड के सबसे शानदार जलप्रपातों में से एक, जो 98 मीटर की गहरी खाई में गिरता है।
pois.special_notes: Most spectacular during monsoon season. Be cautious near the edge.
pois.cultural_significance: Popular picnic spot for locals and tourists alike.
pois.safety_notes: Slippery rocks near waterfall. Children should be supervised.

pois.name: Baidyanath Temple, Deoghar
pois.description: One of the twelve Jyotirlingas, this ancient Shiva temple is a major pilgrimage destination attracting millions of devotees.
pois.description_hindi: बारह ज्योतिर्लिंगों में से एक, यह प्राचीन शिव मंदिर लाखों भक्तों को आकर्षित करने वाला एक प्रमुख तीर्थ स्थल है।
pois.special_notes: Peak season during Shravan month (July-August). Book accommodation in advance.
pois.cultural_significance: Sacred site for Hindus, especially during Kanwar Yatra.
pois.safety_notes: Crowded during peak season. Follow temple rules and dress code.

pois.name: Patratu Dam
pois.description: A scenic dam surrounded by hills, offering boating and water sports activities in a serene environment.
pois.description_hindi: पहाड़ियों से घिरा एक सुंदर बांध, जो शांत वातावरण में नौकायन और जल खेल गतिविधियां प्रदान करता है।
pois.special_notes: Ideal for family outings and water activities. Life jackets provided for boating.
pois.cultural_significance: Popular recreational spot for locals and tourists.
pois.safety_notes: Follow safety instructions for water activities. Children should be supervised.

pois.name: Jonha Falls
pois.description: Also known as Gautamdhara Falls, this beautiful waterfall is surrounded by lush greenery and offers a peaceful retreat.
pois.description_hindi: गौतमधारा जलप्रपात के नाम से भी जाना जाता है, यह सुंदर जलप्रपात हरे-भरे वनस्पति से घिरा है और शांत आश्रय प्रदान करता है।
pois.special_notes: Less crowded than Hundru Falls, offering a more peaceful experience.
pois.cultural_significance: Associated with Buddhist heritage and meditation practices.
pois.safety_notes: Safe for families. Maintain distance from waterfall edge.

pois.name: Tribal Research Institute & Museum
pois.description: Comprehensive museum showcasing Jharkhand's tribal culture, artifacts, and traditional practices.
pois.description_hindi: झारखंड की आदिवासी संस्कृति, कलाकृतियों और पारंपरिक प्रथाओं को प्रदर्शित करने वाला व्यापक संग्रहालय।
pois.special_notes: Excellent for understanding tribal heritage and traditions.
pois.cultural_significance: Important repository of tribal culture and history.
pois.safety_notes: Safe for all ages. Photography may be restricted in some areas.

pois.name: Dassam Falls
pois.description: A spectacular waterfall with multiple cascades, surrounded by dense forests and offering excellent photography opportunities.
pois.description_hindi: घने जंगलों से घिरा एक शानदार जलप्रपात जो कई धाराओं के साथ उत्कृष्ट फोटोग्राफी के अवसर प्रदान करता है।
pois.special_notes: Requires moderate trekking to reach the falls. Best for adventure enthusiasts.
pois.cultural_significance: Popular among nature lovers and adventure seekers.
pois.safety_notes: Trekking required. Wear appropriate footwear. Not suitable for elderly or very young children.

pois.name: Hazaribagh National Park
pois.description: A wildlife sanctuary known for its diverse flora and fauna, offering safari experiences and nature trails.
pois.description_hindi: विविध वनस्पति और जीवों के लिए जाना जाने वाला वन्यजीव अभयारण्य, जो सफारी अनुभव और प्रकृति ट्रेल्स प्रदान करता है।
pois.special_notes: Home to various species including tigers, leopards, and numerous bird species.
pois.cultural_significance: Important conservation area for Jharkhand's wildlife.
pois.safety_notes: Follow park guidelines. Do not venture alone in forest areas.

pois.name: Basukinath Temple
pois.description: An ancient Shiva temple known for its architectural beauty and spiritual significance, especially during Shravan month.
pois.description_hindi: एक प्राचीन शिव मंदिर जो अपनी वास्तुकला की सुंदरता और आध्यात्मिक महत्व के लिए जाना जाता है, विशेष रूप से श्रावण माह के दौरान।
pois.special_notes: Part of the Deoghar pilgrimage circuit. Less crowded than Baidyanath Temple.
pois.cultural_significance: Important pilgrimage site for Shiva devotees.
